name: Segment
long_description: Segment is one place to collect customer data and send it to your tools for analytics, marketing automation, and raw data access with SQL. Implement all of your event tracking with Segmentâ€™s single API instead of wrangling a new API for every new tool or database. Segment's integrations let you send your data to hundreds of tools and databases.
one_liner: Software and APIs to collect, clean, and control customer data.
